name: Happy Holidays Stuffing Cups
description: Stuffing is one of the first dishes to be gobbled up during a holiday feast––make sure you have enough for everyone by making these adorable stuffing cups. Individual servings = enough for everyone at the table.

ingredients.name: dried or day-old bread, or 6 cups croutons

preparation: Chop bread into cubes. You should have about 6 cups. Thinly dice celery. If using, peel and dice apple into bite-sized pieces.
Melt butter in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add celery and apple; cook until tender, about 4 min. Add seasoning and boiling water; stir to combine. Bring to a boil.
Add bread cubes to pan and stir to combine. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 5 min.
Moisten with pan drippings or water, if desired.
Divide warm stuffing into Muffin Maker wells and press down; let cool.
